54.eng-name: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The last Hour will not come unless there is much bloodshed. They said: What is harj? Thereupon he said: Bloodshed. bloodshed

chapter.eng-name: If Two Muslims Confront One Another With Their Swords
